data.name: Page Builder
data.description: Free Up Your Time and Unleash Your Creativity! osDXP Page Builder is a complete design system that includes a drag and drop page builder module and a framework theme. Based on the original WordPress Beaver Builder + Beaver Themer applications, but built for Enterprise grade needs and scalability, osDXP Page Builder is fully osDXP compatible.
data.author: Beaver Builder

data.name: Gravity Forms
data.description: Easily create web forms and manage form entries within the WordPress admin.
data.author: rocketgenius

data.name: osDXP Multilingual
data.description: The multisite-based plugin for your multilingual WordPress websites.
data.author: Inpsyde GmbH

data.name: Progressive Profiling
data.description: Progressive Profiling allows you to have dynamic forms for your users. (requires Gravity Forms)
data.author: Crowd Favorite

data.name: DXP Lead Conversion Tool
data.description: DXP Lead Conversion Tool is an advanced lead generation module that uses a drag and drop editor to help build effective opt-in popups designed to increase interactions and website conversions. Email lists, content promotion, offers and more are easily achieved with DXP Lead Conversion Tool.
data.author: Crowd Favorite

data.name: Shared Counts (osDXP)
data.description: Social sharing buttons that look great and keep your site loading fast.
data.author: Bill Erickson & Jared Atchison - osDXP version by CrowdFavorite

data.name: Login Logo (osDXP)
data.description: Drop a PNG file named login-logo.png into your wp-content directory. This simple plugin takes care of the rest, with zero configuration. Transparent backgrounds work best. Crop it tight, with a width of 312 pixels, for best results.
data.author: Mark Jaquith - osDXP version by Crowd Favorite

data.name: CF Conditional Content
data.description: Conditional content solution for your enterprise.
data.author: Crowd Favorite
